appinsights-mcp.description: Azure Application Insights MCP Server - provides tools for querying Application Insights data, metrics, and telemetry

tools.name: executeQuery
tools.description: Executes a KQL query against Application Insights

parameters.timespan: string (optional) - Time range for the query (e.g., 'PT1H', 'P1D')

tools.name: getApplicationInfo
tools.description: Gets application information from Application Insights

tools.name: getMetric
tools.description: Gets a specific metric from Application Insights

parameters.metricName: string - Name of the metric to retrieve
parameters.timespan: string (optional) - Time range for the metric

tools.name: getEvents
tools.description: Gets events of a specific type from Application Insights

parameters.eventType: string - Type of events to retrieve
parameters.top: number (optional) - Maximum number of events to return
number (optional) - Maximum number of exceptions to return

tools.name: getRequests
tools.description: Gets request telemetry from Application Insights

parameters.top: number (optional) - Maximum number of requests to return

tools.name: getDependencies
tools.description: Gets dependency telemetry from Application Insights

parameters.top: number (optional) - Maximum number of dependencies to return

tools.name: getTraces
tools.description: Gets trace telemetry from Application Insights

parameters.top: number (optional) - Maximum number of traces to return

tools.name: getPerformanceCounters
tools.description: Gets performance counter data from Application Insights

parameters.timespan: string (optional) - Time range for performance counters
parameters.top: number (optional) - Maximum number of performance counters to return

devops-mcp.description: Azure DevOps MCP Server - provides tools for managing work items, projects, and Azure DevOps operations

tools.name: createWorkItems
tools.description: Creates a work item in Azure DevOps

parameters.fields: object - Dictionary of field names and values

tools.name: getWorkItem
tools.description: Gets a work item by its ID

tools.name: updateWorkItem
tools.description: Updates a work item by its ID

parameters.fields: object - Dictionary of field names and values to update

tools.name: deleteWorkItem
tools.description: Deletes a work item by its ID

tools.name: getTags
tools.description: Gets available tags from Azure DevOps

tools.name: queryWorkItems
tools.description: Queries work items using WIQL (Work Item Query Language)

tools.name: getProjects
tools.description: Gets list of projects from Azure DevOps

tools.name: getWorkItemTypes
tools.description: Gets available work item types for a project

description: Copilot configuration for DevOps Assistant MCP servers providing Azure Application Insights and Azure DevOps integration
